steps.title: Basic Info
steps.description: Start by adding a title for the uplaoded paper.

name.label: Title
name.placeholder: e.g. Data mining applications in healthcare
name.help: Enter the research title. Additional information can be added in the next step.

files.label: Files
files.help: Provide one or multiple urls to the research paper, including data used if possible.

steps.title: Category
steps.description: Further describe and categorize your data set to help people discover it.

description.label: Description
description.help: Add a thorough description with as much detail as possible.
description.placeholder: e.g. This article explores data mining applications in healthcare, and major areas such as treatment effectiveness, management of healthcare, customer relationship management, and the detection of fraud and abuse.

categories.label: Category
categories.help: Pick a category which best fits your data set.

dateCreated.label: Publication Date
dateCreated.help: Select the publication date for the paper.

license.label: License
options: PDDL: Public Domain Dedication and License

steps.title: Register
steps.description: Last step is to upload the study!
steps.content: After clicking the button below you will be asked by your Ocean wallet to sign this request. Once published, your research will be available for download on the ResearchHub marketplace.
